.. _gaf:

Global Assessment of Functioning (GAF)
--------------------------------------

.. include:: include_data_collection_only.rst

Intellectual property rights
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Copyright to the GAF held by the American Psychiatric Association (confirmed
  in personal communication, APA to Rudolf Cardinal, 2013-03-21).

- Permission to reproduce the scale refused (personal communication, APA to
  Rudolf Cardinal, 2013-03-21).

History
~~~~~~~

- Health-Sickness Rating Scale (HSRS), Luborsky 1962 Arch Gen Psych;

- then Global Assessment Scale (GAS): Endicott et al. (1976), PMID 938196, Arch
  Gen Psych (= American Medical Association);

- then GAS modified to become GAF as Axis V of DSM-III-R (APA, 1987);

- remains part of DSM-IV-TR (APA, 2000);

- also modified GAF (mGAF), Hall (1995), Psychosomatics (= Elsevier).
